detectors.description:
ERC20ext._transfer(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERC20ext.sol#307-317) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)((block.timestamp > lockedAccount[_from]) || lockedAmount[_from] + _value < balanceOf[_from]) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERC20ext.sol#308)
